column1: in memory of virginia genn -- craddock funeral home| first: last: born: march 18
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:craddock funeral home ardmore
column6: 2015 send card. virginia l. genn was born march 18
column7: 1935 to clyde and vera (rieghl) fadley in vacaville
column8: ca. she passed from this life on june 12
column9: 2015 at the age of 80. virginia enjoyed spending her time outside
column10: taking walks whenever she had a chance. she loved her dog
column12: and had a passion for helping people. most of all
column13: she had a love for the gospel. virginia was preceded in death by her parents and brothers. she is survived by her daughters zelma and zala; sons zack genn
column15: and zeb genn; and her grandchildren. a memorial service will be held tuesday
column17: at 2:00 p. m. at the craddock memorial chapel with jim holt and owen heisler officiating. the family would like to great friends at 1:00 p. m. of tuesday
